import axios from'axios';// Point to backend running on port 8080
const API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:8080/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Bus API
export const busAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/buses'),getById:id=>api.get("/buses/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/buses',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/buses/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/buses/".concat(id))};// Route API
export const routeAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/routes'),getById:id=>api.get("/routes/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/routes',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/routes/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/routes/".concat(id))};// Schedule API
export const scheduleAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/schedules'),getById:id=>api.get("/schedules/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/schedules',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/schedules/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/schedules/".concat(id))};// Timetable API
export const timetableAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/timetables'),getById:id=>api.get("/timetables/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/timetables',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/timetables/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/timetables/".concat(id))};// User API
export const userAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/users'),getById:id=>api.get("/users/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/users',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/users/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/users/".concat(id))};export default api;
